name: Dark Quiet Place
description:
You must get out of the abandoned castle, hiding from dangerous monsters that can kill you.

You must use a flashlight or sneak around to avoid becoming a visible monster. Find a way out of an abandoned building using a skill.

Control:

1) Open Door - (Space)

2) Crouch - (Shift)

3) On/Off Lantern - (E)

4) Menu - (Esc)
